name: Long Distance Lovers
description:
💋 Long Distance Lovers 💋 is a 2-player game about a couple of cafe goers locking eyes across the street - they must kiss. Not wasting any time, they manage to smooch by launching their lips to meet in the middle.

👄 CONTROLS 👄

Player 1 lip flap: S
Player 2 lip flap: K

💋 Long Distance Lovers is part of the Very Very Spaceship Smooch Jam! 💋 Held over a weekend at the VVS Mothership the team set off to make games all about kissin'. Check out the other games here:
Hot Date
Smooch Labs

Check out more of our streams 'n' projects on our social channels: ✨http://vvspaceship.website
